Sassuolo have eyed a new target for their defence in order to replace centre-back Marlon, who joined Fulham. The Neroverdi have targeted Real Madrid B 20-year-old defender Gila Fuentes.

The Italian club have opened talks with Real to reach an agreement for the transfer of the Spanish centre-back, who has only one year left on his deal with the La Liga champions.
